div.p:
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xxij die mensis Decembris
Anno quo supra

the quhilk day it is sufficientlie previt fundin and deliuerit
that richerd hile eldar' sal content and pay to Syme Robertson and his procuratouris
xxviij s' of Siluer for woll resauit fra him within terme of law

div.head: Hed Court
div.p:
Curia Capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per bal
lliuos vndecimo die mensis Januarij Anno Domini et cetera octuagesimo nono
quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in Rotulo
secte

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Willelmus crukschank
capellanus altaris beati Duthaici et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo
redditu vi s' et octo d' sibi et dicto altari annuatim debit' de quadam
terra vasta Jacente in le skuylhile inter terram magistri Duncanj sche
rar' ex orientali et terram thome meldrum ex boreali ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis
in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus
thoma buchane Andrea ranisone et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram religiosus vir frater Johannes
penny prior domus et fratrum predicatorum dicti burgi ac procurator
eiusdem qui protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu sex s' et octo d' sibi
et dicto loco annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico superiore
ecclesie inter terram thome mar ex australi et terram thome prat ex
orientali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos in sacculo ballivis presentauit in Curia tanquam
tercio die huius processus testibus alexandro mernoche Dauid beuerlay
et alexandro allansone seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram thomas rollande et protestatus fuit pro
vnno annuo redditu quinque s' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra
vasta Jacente in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram
Dauid prat ex australi et terram eduardi tope ex boriali ad
quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam tercio
die huius processus Testibus vmfrayo gray Johanne fochile et Duncano
Straloche seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Willelmus Couper et protestatus fuit pro
vno annuo redditu sex s' sibj annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta
Jacente in superiore parte vici Nauium inter terram Donaldi gilfillane
ex orientali et terram dicti Willelmi ex occidentali et communionem viam regiam ex
boreali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos ballivis in Curia presentauit in sacculo tanquam
secundo die huius processus testibus Willelmo cuming Willelmo gray
et philippo Dunbrek seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram honorabilis vir Johannes Knollis et protesta
tus fuit pro vno annuo redditu decim s' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam
terra vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte
eiusdem vici inter terram Roberti blinsel ex australi et terram alexandri
logy ex boreali boriali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo
die huius processus Testibus Johannis chapman thoma narne et alexandro
allanson seriando

Eodem die actio mota per procuratores Walteri ogiluy que Dauid matheson'
penes barrellam salmonum continuatur per Judicem ad quindenam proxime sequentem

Quo die Dauid mathesone non consensit continuacioni actionis mote
contra eum per procuratores Walteri ogiluy super clameo barrelle salmonis

Eodem die Judicium processus magistri Andree cadiow de et super vna
terra vasta Jacente in le hukstarraw continuatur ad quindenam propter debilitatem
Curie

Eodem die actio mota per Dauid mar' contra Willelmum howat penes
clameum trium li' et iiijor s' continuatur ad quindenam per Judicem propter absencia
dicti Willelmi et suorum procuratorum Insuper ballivi assignarunt hodie ad quindenam
eidem Dauid ad respondendum obligacionem producte per Dauid hile ut Jura volunt

In the bailye Courte of abirdene haldin in the tolbutht of the samyn the xiiij
day of Januar the yer forsaide Jonhne chapman at commavnde of the balyeis
lade done vpone the commone kyst fiwe s' Scottis in the quhilkis he was adiugit
obefor to Jonhne of lammyntone be Certane personis in the Courte in ful pament
of certane scottis money for xxxv s' g' the quhilk v s' Jonhne menyes and
William blinsel balyeis resauit ande dischargit the saide Jonhne chapman
of the forsaide fiwe schillingis

the broustaris conuikit for breving' of xij d' aile askit to be remittit
of thar vnlauis and to doubile thar vnlauys gif thai be conuikit in tym tocum
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xviijo die mensis Januarij Anno quosupra

quo die thomas litstar resignauit pure et simpliciter in manibus Willelmi
blinsel balliuj omnia bona sua et terras suas per cirothecam ad soluendum
thome prat summam peccunie sibi debitam de resta pipe wadij conside
rand' et modificand' per conscienciam ipsius thome testibus Arthu
ro forbes alexandro scrogis Johanne Kintor et domino Roberto leis

In the bailye Courte of abirdene haldin the xxi day of Januar' the
yer forsaide Dauid moresone was conuikit be ane assis' for the
wranguis' halding' of lij s' fra Androw lousone cristy prat and
Sandy prat

In the bailye Courte haldin the xxij day of Januar' the yer
forsaide Androw Wentone follouit Dauid beuerlay for x s' of fraucht
the quhilk Dauid was maide quyt of the clame of the said An
drou anent the said x s' be ane assis' Androw branche talisman

the said day Jonhne menyeis grantit him to pay the maile
of ane auchtane partis fischingis of the crovis of the martimes terme
next to cum befor his entray with the saide fischingis becaus' Jhon'
menyeis pait the martimes maile last bigan

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xxvio die Januarij
anno Domini et cetera octuagesimo nono

The quhilk day the aldirman Jonhne
Colisone thomas fyff androu murray eldar Wat auchneyff and Dauid
prat was chosin ande suorne the gret aithe with consent of the merchandis
to lott taxt and extent the costis ande expens' maide for the profit and
recouering of the gudis ande merchandice being in tvne lousonnis schipe
punde pundlik

the samyne day Robert blinsele and Jonhne Colison offerit thame redy
to vndirly ane decisione ande declaracion' of ane assis' of xliiij s'
clamit apone the saide Robert be Williame blinsele for the maile of ane
thridpart nethis fischingis of the pott set to James cuming ande of xxti s'
clamit vpone the saide Jonhne of the maile of ane half nethis fischingis
of the mydchingile quhilk the saide Jonhne allegit pait to the common
clerk

Eodem die Alexander de camera Dauid menyeis et Willelmus
blinsell electi fuerunt commissarij ad proximum parleamentum Inchoandum tercio
die februarij proximo futuro per prepositum et Consules qui promiserunt
dicto Willelmo xl s' ad suas expensas et ipse obligauit se per
terras bona et pistarias suas ad conseruandum burgum Indempnem
de amerciamento decim li' dicti parleamenti

The samyne day the aldirmane with avys' of the consale ordanit philpe
Dunbrek officiar to pas' with sufficient witnes with him and warne
Alexander menyeis to comper befor thame and the balyeis in the tolbutht
one thurisday next to cum the xxviij of Januar instant thar
to ansuer to the clame and instance of William blinsele for' the
wranguis' intrometing and withhalding of his land liand in the
gallougate becaus' the saide alexander allegit that he wald'
vndirly his Juge ordinar his aldirman and balyeis in the
decisione of the said lande Ande for vthir causis that the said
William hed' of resone to allege for him

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos
vicesimo octauo sexto die Januarij Anno quo supra

the quhilk day the aldirman balyeis consal and communite of the saide
burghe' gathtreit riplie avisit ande circualy be euere mannys name
inquerit be the ballieis and officiaris of the samyn burghe' anent ane sum
monce maide apon' diuers' and sindry of the nichtbouris of that Ilk
purchest be Williame erle of erole and gilbert hay sone and apering ayr
to villiame hay of ardendracht and execut be alexander tulidef of that Ilk
is ane commone actione concerning the hale towne and thai to defend' it
as efferis

The samyn day Williame blinsele follouit alexander menyeis be ane bile
of complant affermit ane borghe' quhilkis eftir follouis sere aldirman and
balyeis I William blinsele complenyeis to your mastirschipis that Alexander menyeis
wranguislie and agannis the law occupeies and manvris my land ande
heretage lyand in the gallougate betuix the land of Sanct mary
magdalene one the northt part ande the lande of alexander rollande
one the southt part and the kingis gate one the west syde and wrangis
in the doing of it as he that compellit me of force contrar my
will and wardit me and put me in danger of my lywe quhile
I behuvit to mak ane pretendit alienacion' as I that was denu
dit of al my landis and annuellis in thome of fyffis handis obefor
to mak pament to the saide alexander als' far as law will protestand'
for mair resonnis to be schavin Ande tharto ane borghe' philpe of
Dunbrek officiar' of this Court in thi hande quhilkis the saide
Alexander be him and James leslie his forspekar opinly denyit Ande
in continent the saide action' was put tile the decisione and determina
cion' of ane assis' of thir personis vndir writin that is to say Alexander
rede Jonhne of Culane Alexander chamer yongar thomas prat Dauid
matheson' Androu murray eldar Williame Kintor Androu Wenton'
Dauid prat Wat auchneyf Jonhne grige Alexander nachty William portar
William andirson' eldar and Androu murray yongar quhilkis riplie avi
sit the gret bodely aith' suorne the allegacionis and richtis of batht
the said partiis seyne and vndirstandin deliuerit and decretit be the moutht
of the saide alexander rede talisman of the forsaide assis' the said borghe'
of nayne availe And' that the saide alexander menyeis wrangit nocht in
the occupacione and manuring of the saide lande

Eodem die Willelmus mydiltone in taruas' fecit constituit creauit et nominauit thomam
fyf suum procuratorem legittimum ad petendum et recipiendum a Waltero thomson' quinque barellas
et modium brasei et de receptis acquitand' prosequend' defendend' promittendo
de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij cum ceteris clausulis oportunis

Eodem die Willelmus blinsele pure et simpliciter resignauit in manibus Johannis
menyeis balliuj totam et integram terram suam cum pertinenciis Jacentem in vico Nauium ex
occidentali parte eiusdem inter terram Willelmi clerk ex australi et terram alexandri mar'
ex boriali in manibus ipsius balliuj remanere vsque ad aduentum suum a parli
amento Suppremj dominj nostri Regis ad soluendum sexdecim li' xi s' et iij d' de firmis
piscaris eiusdem burgi per ipsum debitis vt Jura volunt huiusmodi terra appre
ciari et vendi si ipse eandem summam ante suum regressum non persoluerit Testibus
preposito Roberto blinsele Andrea branche Willelmo cuming Richardo craufurd
thoma prat Waltero auchneyf dominis alexandro club matheo nicholson' Roberto
leys pbus' et philippo Dunbrek seriando

The samyn day it was deliuerit and ordanit be the aldirman ballieis and diuers' of
the consale that marione Scot sal deuoyde hir of the toune be settirday at
novne next hereftir Ande gif scho beis fundin remenand' within the tovne atour
the saide tyme al hir gudis salbe eschet and ane key hayt laid one
hir cheik And scho sal assitht and pay patrik andirson' ale that scho and hir
husband' will depone be thar aithis thai haue skathit him

In the bailye Courte of abirdene haldin within the tolbutht the xxix day
of Januar' the forsaide yer the ballieis assignit to morne as day of perem
ptour to ansuer be him self or his procuratouris to Williame of mydilton' for the
wranguis' haldin fra him of v bollis and j f' of malt becaus' he was
lauchfullie processit and warnit obefor to haue comperit til haue ansuerd to
the borghe strekit apone him for the wranguis' haldyne for the saide malte

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio pennultimo die mensis Januarij
anno quo supra

the quhilk day Androw lammyngton' grantit him avand'
to William broys' xl s' of Siluer the quhilk he oblist him be the
fatht of his body to pay to alexander rede of petfodellis or ellis
to the saide William be fasterinevin at next cumys

the samyn day the court wardit ande gaf for dome that Wat thomson'
sal content and pay to Williame of mydiltone v barrelis and j f' of malt
within terme of law And' the said Wat in Amerciament of the court for the
wranguis' haldin of the saide malt becaus' the said Walter was
lauchfully warnit callit and nocht comperit be his self nor his procuratouris
as was lauchfully preuit be the officiaris and thar previs producit and suorne

the saide day Alexander prat suorne the gret aith' deponit that he was
present herd ande sawe Jonhne of lamyngtone and Androu lamminton' cum souerte
be thar handis vphaldin' to thome Wodman to keipe him skatht
les' of al gudis that the saide thomas come Souerte to Androw murray
eldar for cowy Jonhnesone

the samyn day it was fundyne and deliuerit be ane assis' thomas fyf
talisman that William of gareache has ansuerd to the merchandis as skippar
ande aw to haue his fee tharfor that is to say aucht crovnis for his
rays' maid in franche viij crovnis for the rais' in flandris and x cronis'
for the rais' in Danskin' And' anent vj s' g' and ane berys' expens
the tane is quyt for the tothir Alsua anent ij eln' and demi of brade
clath Williame gareache sal depone be his aith' he gat na pament
tharfor ande Androw Wenton' sal pay him x s' Anent the borrouit
siluer in Danskin Will gareache sal depone be his aith' that he coud' get
it nay bettir chaipe for that tyme and it come vtirly to androw Wen
tonis profit for the rede of his part of the schipe Anent x s' clamit
be Androu Wentone for Dauid beuerlay it salbe pait be the avnaris
and the said skippar sal ansuer to the said Androw for it And' anent the
xiij s' clamit be the saide William of ane ald' rest the saide Androw
Wentone is quyt

the firsta day of februar Jonhne lammyntone deponit be his aith' that he come souerte
be his hand vphaldin in siclikuis' as Androw lammynton his brothir come to thom
Wodman to kep him skathles of al gudis that he come sourete to Androw murray
eldar for Cove Jonhnesone
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xijo die februarij Anno quo supra

the samyn day the aldirman and balyeis with avys' of the Court assignit
monunday that next cumis to thomas mar as day of peremptour to ansuer
tile ane borghe' strekit apone him be alexander rede in the handis of philp of
Dunbrek officiar' for the wranguis' intrometing with ane serplat of woll
of his contening' sex wall with the mair' ande acht to vpricht the skatht suste
nit tharthrou and wrangis that he dois it nocht

The saide day Androw philpsone grantit in presens of the aldirman ande balyeis
that he hede set to Malcum of crage the forchamer the loft of the samyne
and the butht nerrast the stair liande in the castalgate one the southt part of the
samyn gate for ane yer' fra the next Witsonday furtht pertening to his wyf
Jonet rogersone be resone of Junctfeftment for xl s' of maile and j peter of
tyde woll or the price of the samyn

the saide day it was fundin ande deliuerit be ane assise Jonhne colison'
talisman that patrik rede wranguislie has intromettit with ane serplat of
woll contening sex wale with the mair' belangand' to alexander rede for the quhilk
the saide patrik was in Amerciament of the court and the borghe' strekit apone
him fundin of vaile and tile amend' as law wile and assitht the saide alexander
as law wile

The saide day the borghe' strekit apone mathow crage be gilbert moreson'
for the wranguis haldin fra him of xx skinnis was fundin of waile
and the saide malcum in Amerciament of the courte for the wranguis' haldin of
the said skinnis
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xv die mensis februarij anno quo supra

the samyn day Walter auchneywe producit and schew in Jugement ane asse
dacion of ane half nethis fischingis of the pot set to him for this
next yer be mathou Culane desirand' gif androw branche hed mair'
richt tharto thane he that he sulde decist tharfra And gif he hed richt
that he mycht breuk it thareftir the aldirman ande balyeis with avys
of the court assignit friday that next cumis to bath the said partiis
to cum befor thame ande schew thar richtis

The saide day Jonhne blak was conuikit be ane assis' for the wrang
forstalling of the burghe' tile amende as law wile and tile forber' in tym'
to cum

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod Elizabeth' modane
et cristina modane sunt heredes legittime quondam Richardi modane patris
suj

add.note: This marginal heading is placed besides the next entry.

div.p:
The samyn day the aldirman ande balyeis with avys' of the court
assignit Wednisday that next cumis to alexander rede as day of peremptour
tile ane borghe' strekit apone him be thomas mar' for the wranguis'
withhaldin fra him of fiwe li' or tharby to gud compt and rekning in
penny ande pennyworthtis as is contenit in his bile of covnte
in the handis of philp Dunbrek officiar'

the samyn day it was fundyne ande deliuerit be ane assis' gilbert more
sone talisman that Jonhne talyour sal preyf one fryday that next cumis
that philp of Dunbrek come dettour to him for x s' with the maire
for his maiche

the samyn day the borghe' strekit apone thomas mar be alexander
rede for the wranguis' intrometing with ane serplat of woll of
his contening sex wal with the mair' was fundyne of wale and the
saide thomas was in Amerciament of the Court for the wranguis' intro
meting with the saide serplat and to amende as law wile

In the balye Court of abirdene haldin the xvi day of februar' the yer
forsaide the aldirman ande balyeis with avys' of the Courte assignit this
day xv dais ad as day of peremptour to Jonhne Colisone tile ansuer
tile ane borghe' strekit apone him be Williame blinsele for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of ane letter vndir his seile tueching ane alienacion of
his landis of tua lang rigis and the angelewele as he that hed ane day
to the redeming of thame that was candilmes'day eftir the date contenit
in the said letter and hes redemyt the samyn and maid thankfule pament
to him within his day And philp Dunbrek officiar' warnit the said Jhon'
to comper the saide say to ansuer' to the forsaid borghe'

the saide day Johne Colisone protestit solemptlie quhat was done in
the said matir suld turne him to nay preiudice nay he micht haue remede
of law

the saide day Dauid quhit procuratour and factour to hans' quhit his
brothir duellande in Danskin grant him to haue resauit fra Williame gare
ache eldar pament for ane last of burdis ane last of as' tene barrellis
of tar ande meile ande fiwe crovnis and viij s' of lent Siluer to him

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos xixo
die februarij Anno quosupra

the samyne day it was decretit and deliuerit
be the aldirman balyeis ande the haile courte that the grot apon the quhilk
Wat of craufurd ande thome narne weddit iiij inglis grotis was
bot xiiij d' for the quhilkis the saide iiijor inglis g' was adiugit to the sade
Walter and deliuerit to him ande he quyt of the saide thomas challance

Eodem die actio debatabilis inter Walterum auchneyf et andream branche
penes assedacionem pistariarum dimidij rethis de pot continuatur vsque ad
sextam feriam per prepositum et consules

The samyn day Williame gareache mydlar was conuikit be ane assis' for
the forstalling of the borghe' in forstalling of skynnis tile amende as
law wile and to forber in tyme to cum

The saide day Jonhne tailyour falyeit in his preyf anent the x s'
in contrar philp of Dunbrek Ande the saide philp quyt of his challance
except xxxij d' quhilk the aldirman and balyeis chargit the forsaide
philp to content ande pay to the saide Jonhne

the saide say the borghe' strekit apone alexander rede be thomas mare
for the wranguys' halding fra him of fiwe li' or tharby in penny
or pennyworthtis was fundin of nay vaile and the said thomas
in Amerciament of the court for the wranguis' strekin' of the said borghe

In the bailye Court of abirdene haldin' the xx day of februar the
yer forsaide / the merchandis ande frauchtismene of the hulk one that
ane part Ande Robert blinsele ane of the avnaris of the samyn one that
vthir parte ar content that thir personis vndir writyne that is to say
Jhone Wormet Dauid mathesone thome prat Willekin lichthernes
Adrian olynsone skippar of the bus' Dauid menyes eldar Jonhne Waus
in futy James peter the skippar of the litilbus' alexander menyes Jonhne
gilespy Androu murray eldar Adrian philpson' Jonhne low Dauid
prat and henrik of the barbora be warnit to comper befor the aldirman
and balyeis one friday that next cumis to decide eftir thar aithis how mekle'
fraucht thai ar avande to the said robert for thar gudis ladyn' in the saide
schip / batht the saide partiis havand preuilege tile excep agan the
saide personis the saide day And the said Robert is content herof say that
it do nay preiudice to the layf of his avnaris

the saide day Williame of gareache was fundin quyt of xxiiij s'
follouit be Williame Wormet be ane borghe' strekit apon' him and
the saide William Wormet in Amerciament of the court for the wranguis'
strekin' of the said borghe'

The saide day it was fundin' ande deliuerit be ane assis' Dauid
mar' talisman that Williame gareache eldar sal comper befor the
aldirman ande balyeis one friday that next cumis within the tolbutht
with thre of vnsuspect personis of his schip and depone be thar aithis
that Williame Wormet is avande him fraucht of tua barrellis and that
being done the said Williame Wormet sal pay him the saide fraucht

The saide day Williame of gareache eldar grantit that he trouyt Dauid
Duffous' wantit ane barrele of meile that was laide in the hulk

the samyn day James Jofrasone be his avne tounge grant was conuikit
for forstalling of the burghe' in woll skynnis ande regratinge and
tile amende as law wile and forbeire in tyme to Cum
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxvio die februarij Anno quosupra

the samyn day it was statutit and ordanit be the aldirman and diuers' of the
consale ande merchandis for the gude of merchandice that nay salt be resavit
beyonde the sey be naman leswys' nay he haue tua leylmene vnsuspek
with him at the bying and resauing of it And that thai bring hame the samyn mesour
that thai resaue it with ande deliuer it agane with the samyn Ande that nay wyne
be stellit amang salt in tyme to Cum vndir the payne of recompensinge
of the skatht that sale happin' the merchandis sustene tharthrow

the samyn day the aldirman ande balyeis with avys' of the haile courte assig
nit tuysday that next cumis the secunde day of marche as day of peremp
toure to thomas mar' tile ansuer tile ane borghe strekit apon him
be alexander rede in the handis of philp Dunbrek seriande that the said thomas
suld gif him alsmekile for his serplar of woll as ony gaf of the rays'
siclik gude and sicklik wecht with the quhilk serplar he wranguislie intrometit
and wrangis and he do it nocht Ande thai discernit the copy of the said borghe to the
saide thomas
